p: In summary, with the PHS as a sample, our study provide evidence to illustrate the application value of the system in the evaluation of the toxicity of Chinese medicinal materials. After long-term exposure, PHS had a variety of toxic effects in C. elegans, which may be the result of a combination of the nervous system and Insulin/IGF-1 signaling pathway. In the future, the detection of the beneficial or adverse effects of specific chemical constituents in PHS will help us further understand and control the toxicity formation and clinical use of this drug.
